content: Yes, I'm familiar with Otros Vinos! They are a Spanish natural wine producer that is based in Madrid. The company was founded by winemaker Fernando Garcia, who was previously the head winemaker at the prestigious winery Bodegas Marañones. Otros Vinos specializes in producing wines that are made with minimal intervention, using organic and biodynamic farming practices and wild yeast fermentation. The wines are known for their purity and expression of the terroir, as well as their unique and often experimental blends. Otros Vinos has received widespread critical acclaim for its wines, and they are considered to be one of the leading producers of natural wine in Spain.
